text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Morishima was born in Mie Prefecture on April 25, 1997. After graduating from Yokkaichi Chuo Technical High School, he joined J1 League club Sanfrecce Hiroshima in 2016. He played many matches from 2019. In December 2019, Morishima was selected the Japan national team for 2019 E-1 Football Championship.
